title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: Welcome RAINER - new best friend R. RAINER provides explanations error messages, outputs matching intended results suggestions improvements code. Using large language model (LLM), examines current state workspace code troubleshoot problem.

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: r_error(): use function get explanation error message means, occured correct issue r_activate(): use function automatically trigger r_error() always error message occurs r_explain(): use function output (e.g.¬†table) yield result intended without throwing error message r_improve(): use function get suggestions improve code

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: RAINER currently available CRAN (yet), can installed directly GitHub. install package, use command .
code: # If you have not installed it yet, install the remotes package first install.packages("remotes")  # Install RAINER remotes::install_github("soda-lmu/rainer")

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: load RAINER first time, guided setup process. RAINER ask input following questions store response computer, answer . detailed information questions can found . Accepting data protection regulations GitHub token (see can get one) preferred language (German üá©üá™ English üá¨üáß) Whether requests RAINER can logged (totally optional) want change response questions later , can using following functions: rainer:::dataprot(), rainer:::github_token(), rainer:::language(), rainer:::logging().

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: GitHub token can access LLMs free charge GitHub Models. RAINER uses , need personal GitHub token, can create following steps: Go GitHub page managing tokens: https://github.com/settings/tokens Make sure selected ‚ÄòTokens (classic)‚Äô left Click ‚ÄòGenerate new token‚Äô upper right corner Next, need choose scopes token (‚Äôs allowed ) expiration date (token stops working). using RAINER accessing LLMs need select scopes. Success, created token! üéâ Now make sure copy RAINER check works, closing website. expiration date, token (RAINER) stop working need create new token. can provide new token RAINER rainer:::github_token().
